source: TEXT_JOBAOZ580_03735_SEQ_00<tab>Martyn is desperately trying to take his mind off of the impending match with Siegfried.
target: TEXT_JOBAOZ580_03735_SEQ_00<tab>ウルダハのマーティンは、実証研究に付き合ってほしいようだ。

source: TEXT_JOBAOZ580_03735_SEQ_01<tab>Martyn, in spite of his upcoming match with a Coliseum gladiator, has instead thrown himself into researching the applications of blue magic. He is particularly interested to know how well the spells he has mastered will keep a party of blue mages fighting fit while exploring dangerous locations, such as Copperbell Mines, which he plans to visit. A recent increase in hecatoncheir activity has made the mineral excavation site too hazardous for the workers to enter, and Martyn aims to quell the uprising, test his theories, and train P'yandih and Nutiba Buntiba, all in one fell swoop. His two young apprentices have been told to wait for you in the nearby settlement of Horizon, with the mines a short distance away.
target: TEXT_JOBAOZ580_03735_SEQ_01<tab>マーティンと話し、「青魔道士万能説」の実証研究のため、ヘカトンケイレス族が現れた、「カッパーベル銅山」へ赴くことになった。弟子たちと合流するため、西ザナラーンのホライズンで「マーティン」と話そう。

source: TEXT_JOBAOZ580_03735_SEQ_02<tab>In Horizon, P'yandih explains that she has already visited Copperbell Mines on several occasions. Nutiba Buntiba, on the other hand, lacks her experience, but has made efforts to study the layout of the tunnels. Martyn, meanwhile, has next to no knowledge of the mines, having never been there himself and neglecting to gather any information beforehand. However, Nutiba's motto of “By failing to prepare, you are preparing to fail,” seems to have struck a chord with him. Martyn leads the party across the plains of western Thanalan to the site of the proposed hecatoncheir hunt.
target: TEXT_JOBAOZ580_03735_SEQ_02<tab>マーティンと話し、弟子たちと合流した。西ザナラーンのカッパーベル銅山入口付近で「マーティン」と話そう。

source: TEXT_JOBAOZ580_03735_SEQ_03<tab>To the surprise of all, the first opponent to greet the party is not a hecatoncheir, but a winged voidsent. Martyn and his two students have already slain the beast by the time you arrive, and since you were too late to join the battle, you are nominated to search the area for a similar creature that has escaped them and poses a threat to the people of Horizon.
target: TEXT_JOBAOZ580_03735_SEQ_03<tab>マーティンと話したところ、見慣れない妖異が現れたので倒したという。ほかにもいるようなので、冒険者が倒すことになった。カッパーベル銅山入口付近の「<var 28 ((EObj)) F61EAEE101 /var>」で見渡し、現れた妖異を討伐しよう。

source: TEXT_JOBAOZ580_03735_SEQ_04<tab>You soon discover the voidsent hovering ominously a short distance from the mine, and despite its determination to rip you into bite-sized meaty chunks, it finally succumbs to your blue magic. You return to report the outcome of your battle to Martyn and the others, who are still attempting to unravel the mystery of what exactly has occurred here.
target: TEXT_JOBAOZ580_03735_SEQ_04<tab>妖異を討伐した。カッパーベル銅山入口付近の「マーティン」と話そう。

source: TEXT_JOBAOZ580_03735_SEQ_05<tab>Martyn comes to the realization that the voidsent are identical to those used in the Masked Carnivale, and the question as to how this could have happened is soon answered when Fyrgeiss and his son Zirnberk burst forth from the mine. They had released voidsent into the tunnels as a means of eradicating the hecatoncheires that had invaded Copperbell Mines, a task which would normally fall to the Stone Torches. Having learned of Fyrgeiss's whereabouts from his underlings, Royse arrives on the scene to berate him for taking the voidsent from the Celestium's menagerie. He responds by claiming that his recent investment gives him the right to use the creatures as he pleases. Royse emphasizes that in spite of the financial backing she has received, her position remains unchanged, sparking a vitriolic exchange between her and Fyrgeiss. Martyn interjects to suggest that rather than using voidsent, Amajina & Sons could instead hire the Blue Mages' Guild to protect their property. When this proposal is cruelly thrown back in his face, he quickly changes tack by offering a wager based on the outcome of his match with Zirnberk. In the event that he loses, control of the Celestium would pass to Fyrgeiss, and the use of voidsent as living weapons would be allowed to continue. Should Martyn win the contest, Royse would remain as owner and the Blue Mages' Guild would enter the employ of Amajina & Sons Mineral Concern. Though Royse is aghast at the idea of placing her livelihood in Martyn's less-than-reliable hands, Fyrgeiss willingly accepts, assured that his son will emerge the victor. Having said more than enough for one day, your mentor decides against making the situation any worse than it already is by retiring to Ul'dah to prepare for his highly anticipated battle.
target: TEXT_JOBAOZ580_03735_SEQ_05<tab>マーティンと話したところ、フィルガイスとツィルンベルクが現れ、さらにロイスが現れた。フィルガイスはマスクカーニバル用の魔物を兵器として利用していたのだった。ロイスはそれに憤慨して、両者は激しく対立しブルースカイの経営権を巡る争いにまで発展する。マーティンがマスク・ザ・ブルーとジークフリードの試合で決着をつけることを提案し、フィルガイスはこれを承諾する。ウルダハのミルバネス礼拝堂付近で「マーティン」と話そう。

source:
TEXT_JOBAOZ580_03735_SEQ_06Back at the Blue Mages' Guild, Martyn's bravado does little to set Royse's mind at ease, and it seems that she is all but resigned to losing the Celestium. Martyn's preparations for the fight seem to extend only to asking that you be ready to stand in for him, in the not-as-unlikely-as-one-might-think event that he would be prevented from participating. Being in the habit of asking you to learn specific blue magic spells, he instructs you to master Frog Legs. Strangely enough, this is a technique for drawing the enemy's attention, which is seldom an issue in the arena, though as Martyn points out, the day may soon arrive that you have a chance to use it, should the guild ever enter the employ of Amajina & Sons.

※The next blue mage quest will be available from Martyn upon reaching level 60 and learning Frog Legs.
target:
TEXT_JOBAOZ580_03735_SEQ_06マーティンと話した。やはり頼りない師だが、青魔道士として限界まで高めたら、青魔法「フロッグレッグ」をラーニングして、マーティンのもとへ戻ってこよう。

※青魔道士のレベルが60以上になり、青魔法「フロッグレッグ」をラーニングすると、ミルバネス礼拝堂付近のマーティンから次の青魔道士クエストを受注することができます。

source: TEXT_JOBAOZ580_03735_TODO_00<tab>Speak with Martyn in Horizon.
target: TEXT_JOBAOZ580_03735_TODO_00<tab>ホライズンのマーティンと話す

source: TEXT_JOBAOZ580_03735_TODO_01<tab>Speak with Martyn.
target: TEXT_JOBAOZ580_03735_TODO_01<tab>マーティンと話す

source: TEXT_JOBAOZ580_03735_TODO_02<tab>Survey the designated location and defeat any voidsent that appear.
target: TEXT_JOBAOZ580_03735_TODO_02<tab>指定地点を見渡して妖異を討伐する

source: TEXT_JOBAOZ580_03735_TODO_03<tab>Speak with Martyn.
target: TEXT_JOBAOZ580_03735_TODO_03<tab>マーティンと話す

source: TEXT_JOBAOZ580_03735_TODO_04<tab>Speak with Martyn in Ul'dah.
target: TEXT_JOBAOZ580_03735_TODO_04<tab>ウルダハのマーティンと話す

source: TEXT_JOBAOZ580_03735_MARTYN_100_000<tab>I appreciate your enthusiasm, but you can hardly be considered my equal if you haven't even learned Exuviation yet!
target:
TEXT_JOBAOZ580_03735_MARTYN_100_000)) (( )) 02 /var>君。
随分と鍛錬を重ねてきたようだが、
青魔法「イグジュビエーション」をラーニングしていないのでは？

source: TEXT_JOBAOZ580_03735_SYSTEM_100_001<tab>The next blue mage quest will be available from Martyn upon learning Exuviation.
target:
TEXT_JOBAOZ580_03735_SYSTEM_100_001青魔法「イグジュビエーション」をラーニングすると、
マーティンから、次の青魔道士クエストを受注することができます。

source: TEXT_JOBAOZ580_03735_MARTYN_000_000<tab>You might be wonderin' why I'd ask you to learn Exuviation of all things.
target:
TEXT_JOBAOZ580_03735_MARTYN_000_000)) (( )) 02 /var>君！
どうやら、充分に鍛錬を重ねて、
青魔法「イグジュビエーション」も、ラーニングできたようだな。

source: TEXT_JOBAOZ580_03735_MARTYN_000_001<tab>Well, it's all part of my research into the versatility of blue mages. You can use it to heal yourself, of course, but I want to see how effective that spell is in keepin' your friends alive and kickin'.
target:
TEXT_JOBAOZ580_03735_MARTYN_000_001さっそく、私の実証研究に付き合ってもらおう。
それはずばり、私と君と弟子たちの青魔道士だけで、
「危険地帯」に突入するというもの。

source: TEXT_JOBAOZ580_03735_MARTYN_000_002<tab>In fact, I thought we'd take P'yandih and Nutiba out into the field to test a few of my theories. It'll be good trainin' for them, too. I've sent them ahead to Horizon, and from there we'll head to Copperbell Mines, where I hear hecatoncheires are causin' a spot of bother.
target:
TEXT_JOBAOZ580_03735_MARTYN_000_002そして踏破することで、攻撃役はもちろん、盾役や癒し手をも、
兼任できるという「青魔道士万能説」を証明するのだ。
もちろん、これは弟子の修行も兼ねている。

source: TEXT_JOBAOZ580_03735_MARTYN_000_003<tab>An ongoin' problem, by all accounts. Sounds like the perfect chance to show off our teamwork. Not that we've ever worked as a team before, but this seems a good place to start!
target:
TEXT_JOBAOZ580_03735_MARTYN_000_003ちょうどいいことに、「カッパーベル銅山」に、
ヘカトンケイレス族が現れ騒乱が起こっているようだ。
まずは「ホライズン」へ向かい、弟子たちと合流しよう。

source: TEXT_JOBAOZ580_03735_LATOOLJA_000_004<tab>Latool Ja not sure about this plan. Nutiba and P'yandih probably think this just a training exercise, but hecatoncheires very dangerous!
target:
TEXT_JOBAOZ580_03735_LATOOLJA_000_004先生は研究、や弟子のため、とか言いなが、ら、
実のところ、試合に向け、て自分の修行を、したいだけ、です。

source: TEXT_JOBAOZ580_03735_LATOOLJA_000_005<tab>Please, try to keep all three from harm. Maybe <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var> act as healer, yes?
target:
TEXT_JOBAOZ580_03735_LATOOLJA_000_005お手数、ですが、
先生、の修行、に付き合って、あげて、ください。

source: TEXT_JOBAOZ580_03735_LATOOLJA_000_008<tab>Martyn very irresponsible to take new recruits into hecatoncheir-infested mines. Latool Ja say even cave bats too strong for those novices.
target:
TEXT_JOBAOZ580_03735_LATOOLJA_000_008)) (( )) 02 /var>さん、
先生、の修行、に付き合って、あげて、ください。

source: TEXT_JOBAOZ580_03735_MARTYN_000_010<tab>Where the bloody hells are they? Knowin' those two, they're probably gettin' fleeced by some swindler or another. Ahem.
target:
TEXT_JOBAOZ580_03735_MARTYN_000_010ラトージャ君が何か余計なことを言ってなかったかね？
まあいい、弟子たちも到着する頃合いだ……。

source: TEXT_JOBAOZ580_03735_MARTYN_000_011<tab>Oh, look who it is! Finished sightseein', have we?
target: TEXT_JOBAOZ580_03735_MARTYN_000_011<tab>やあ君たち、待っていたよ……

source: TEXT_JOBAOZ580_03735_NUTIBABUNTIBA_000_012<tab>Master <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>! Since last we met, my blue magic has come on leaps and bounds!
target:
TEXT_JOBAOZ580_03735_NUTIBABUNTIBA_000_012お久しぶりです、)) (( )) 02 /var>さん！
あれから、僕たちもたくさん青魔法を習得しました！

source: TEXT_JOBAOZ580_03735_PYANDIH_000_013<tab>And thanks to our last lesson, I'm better at keeping my enemies on the back foot! Or tentacle. Well, whatever it might be.
target:
TEXT_JOBAOZ580_03735_PYANDIH_000_013)) (( )) 02 /var>さんの青魔法まわし、
私もだいぶ真似できるようになったんですよ！

source: TEXT_JOBAOZ580_03735_MARTYN_000_014<tab>Oi! Don't go gettin' ahead of yourselves. You might have a few new spells and a bit more experience, but if you get complacent, those hecatoncheires'll be grindin' your bones before you can say “Flying Sardine”!
target:
TEXT_JOBAOZ580_03735_MARTYN_000_014コラコラッ！　浮ついてるんじゃないぞ！
私たちはこれから、巨人族が跋扈する危険地帯に赴くんだからね！！

source: TEXT_JOBAOZ580_03735_PYANDIH_000_015<tab>Hmph! I'm no stranger to Copperbell Mines, you know. Hecatoncheires don't scare me!
target:
TEXT_JOBAOZ580_03735_PYANDIH_000_015平気ですよ、この手の巨人族退治でしたら、
私は何度か経験ありますから……。

source: TEXT_JOBAOZ580_03735_NUTIBABUNTIBA_000_016<tab>As this is my first time exploring this particular location, I have been asking other adventurers for advice, checking the layout of the tunnels and so forth. “By failing to prepare, you are preparing to fail,” is my motto! How about you, guildmaster?
target:
TEXT_JOBAOZ580_03735_NUTIBABUNTIBA_000_016僕は初見ですが、冒険者仲間から情報を聞いてまわり、
坑道内部の構造など、下調べはバッチリです！
先生はどうなんですか……？

source: TEXT_JOBAOZ580_03735_MARTYN_000_017<tab>Well, I can't say I've been there myself, but when you're as proficient in the blue arts as I am, you can sort of...play it by ear, so to speak.
target: TEXT_JOBAOZ580_03735_MARTYN_000_017<tab>も、もちろん初見だが……「下調べ」だと？

source: TEXT_JOBAOZ580_03735_MARTYN_000_018<tab>Say, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>, you know anythin' about Copperbell Mines?
target: TEXT_JOBAOZ580_03735_MARTYN_000_018<tab>き、君はどうなのだ、<var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>君……？

source: TEXT_JOBAOZ580_03735_Q1_000_000<tab>What will you say?
target: TEXT_JOBAOZ580_03735_Q1_000_000<tab>何と言う？

source: TEXT_JOBAOZ580_03735_A1_000_001<tab>I've been there more times than you've had hot dinners.
target: TEXT_JOBAOZ580_03735_A1_000_001<tab>何度も行っているから余裕だ！

source: TEXT_JOBAOZ580_03735_A1_000_002<tab>Every nook and cranny is indelibly etched into my memory.
target: TEXT_JOBAOZ580_03735_A1_000_002<tab>下調べはバッチリだ！

source: TEXT_JOBAOZ580_03735_MARTYN_000_019<tab>Maybe I should let you take the lead, then. Ha ha! Only joking! We all know who the leader is. Blue mages, with me!
target:
TEXT_JOBAOZ580_03735_MARTYN_000_019そ、そうか……私だけが……。
と、ともかく「カッパーベル銅山」へ向かおう！

source: TEXT_JOBAOZ580_03735_MARTYN_000_020<tab>You're pullin' my leg, ain't you? So, the only one who knows nothin' about the place...is me? Hmph! I've never been the sort to let a complete lack of prior knowledge stop me from doin' anythin' before, and I ain't about to start now. Blue mages, with me!
target:
TEXT_JOBAOZ580_03735_MARTYN_000_020ど、どうやら同志のようだな……。
と、ともかく「カッパーベル銅山」へ向かおう！

source: TEXT_JOBAOZ580_03735_NUTIBABUNTIBA_000_026<tab>I wasn't expecting to be attacked before even setting foot in the mine, let alone by a...voidsent? I assume that's what it is. Was, rather.
target: TEXT_JOBAOZ580_03735_NUTIBABUNTIBA_000_026<tab>着いた途端、この辺りでは見かけない妖異に襲われました。

source: TEXT_JOBAOZ580_03735_PYANDIH_000_027<tab>I don't know what it is, but I'm glad it's dead. Wait. Did it just twitch, or am I imagining things?
target: TEXT_JOBAOZ580_03735_PYANDIH_000_027<tab><var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>さん、気を付けてください。

source: TEXT_JOBAOZ580_03735_MARTYN_000_030<tab>We were waitin' for you to show up when this bloody horrible flyin' bastard came out of nowhere! Even though it caught us off guard, it was no match for the combined might of our blue magic!
target:
TEXT_JOBAOZ580_03735_MARTYN_000_030)) (( )) 02 /var>君。
急にこの妖異が襲ってきたので、倒したところだ……。

source: TEXT_JOBAOZ580_03735_MARTYN_000_031<tab>There was another one that went flappin' off somewhere, but we're too knackered to go after it. Seein' as you missed all the fun, I'm volunteerin' you to go and look for it. And be quick about it! All hells'll break loose if that thing reaches Horizon.
target:
TEXT_JOBAOZ580_03735_MARTYN_000_031一匹逃してしまい、この一角から出てしまったようだ。
すまないが、周辺地域に危険が及ぶ前に、
君に探して倒してもらいたい。

source: TEXT_JOBAOZ580_03735_MARTYN_000_036<tab>I need you to track down and kill that voidsent before it gets away!
target:
TEXT_JOBAOZ580_03735_MARTYN_000_036妖異を一匹逃してしまい、この一角から出てしまったようだ。
すまないが、周辺地域に危険が及ぶ前に、
君に探して倒してもらいたい。

source: TEXT_JOBAOZ580_03735_NUTIBABUNTIBA_000_037<tab>Voidsent don't simply appear out of thin air. Someone or <var 1A 02 /var>something<var 1A 01 /var> must be behind this...
target:
TEXT_JOBAOZ580_03735_NUTIBABUNTIBA_000_037もう倒してくれたんですか？
私たちにはとても、敵わない相手でした……。

source: TEXT_JOBAOZ580_03735_PYANDIH_000_038<tab>It took all three of us to kill the first voidsent, and then you show up and take down one by yourself! Seems like we've got a lot to learn, including the guildmaster...
target:
TEXT_JOBAOZ580_03735_PYANDIH_000_038早くも倒してくれたんですね？
さすがは、)) (( )) 02 /var>さんです……！

source: TEXT_JOBAOZ580_03735_MARTYN_000_040<tab>Nicely done, mate. Now that I think of it, I've seen creatures like this before. They're used in the Masked Carnivale!
target:
TEXT_JOBAOZ580_03735_MARTYN_000_040ご苦労だった……。
それにしても、見覚えのある妖異だと思ったら、
間違いない、こいつはマスクカーニバル用のものだ！

source: TEXT_JOBAOZ580_03735_MARTYN_000_041<tab>Which raises the question: what are they doin' here?
target: TEXT_JOBAOZ580_03735_MARTYN_000_041<tab>しかし、なぜこんなところに……？

source: TEXT_JOBAOZ580_03735_FYRGEISS_000_042<tab>(-???-)They went this way! Quickly!
target: TEXT_JOBAOZ580_03735_FYRGEISS_000_042<tab>(-？？？？-)君たち、大丈夫かね……？

source: TEXT_JOBAOZ580_03735_MARTYN_000_043<tab>Fyrgeiss! And his son, Zirnfrieg...or was that Siegberk? Bah, whatever his bloody name is!
target:
TEXT_JOBAOZ580_03735_MARTYN_000_043あ、あなたは、フィルガイスさん……
それから……ジークフリードの中の人！？

source: TEXT_JOBAOZ580_03735_FYRGEISS_000_044<tab>Azuro? You and your little friends managed to slay the escaped voidsent? It seems you have spared our blushes.
target:
TEXT_JOBAOZ580_03735_FYRGEISS_000_044そういう君は、マスク・ザ・ブルーじゃないか？
なるほど、外に逃げ出した妖異は君たちが倒してくれたのか……。

source: TEXT_JOBAOZ580_03735_MARTYN_000_045<tab>Sod all that, just tell us what's goin' on!
target: TEXT_JOBAOZ580_03735_MARTYN_000_045<tab>これはいったい、どういうことでしょう……？

source: TEXT_JOBAOZ580_03735_ROYSE_000_046<tab>(-???-)You heard him, Fyrgeiss!
target: TEXT_JOBAOZ580_03735_ROYSE_000_046<tab>(-？？？？-)本当に、いったいぜんたいどういうことよッ！！

source: TEXT_JOBAOZ580_03735_MARTYN_000_047<tab>Royse as well? Bloody hells, they're all comin' out of the woodwork now.
target: TEXT_JOBAOZ580_03735_MARTYN_000_047<tab>こ、今度はロイスさん……！？

source: TEXT_JOBAOZ580_03735_ROYSE_000_048<tab>I'm lucky your underlings are so loose-lipped, or I would never have tracked you down. You think you can make off with my voidsent and get away with it!? Investor or not, you've crossed the line.
target:
TEXT_JOBAOZ580_03735_ROYSE_000_048ウチの大事な魔物を勝手に持ち出すなんて、どういうつもりッ！？
いくら出資者だからって、許されないわよッ！！

source: TEXT_JOBAOZ580_03735_FYRGEISS_000_049<tab>Now, now. I simply borrowed a couple in an attempt to quell the hecatoncheir uprising taking place on Concern property.
target:
TEXT_JOBAOZ580_03735_FYRGEISS_000_049まあまあ、落ち着きたまえ。
我が協会が所有するカッパーベル銅山に、巨人族が現れたのでね、
ブルースカイの魔物を鎮圧用の兵器として投入してみたのだよ。

source: TEXT_JOBAOZ580_03735_FYRGEISS_000_050<tab>I am sure you will be pleased to hear that your vodorigas proved to be most effective! Veritable living weapons! You see, the task seemed a waste of the Stone Torches' talents, and hiring adventurers can be awfully costly.
target:
TEXT_JOBAOZ580_03735_FYRGEISS_000_050すると、ものの見事にヘカトンケイレス族を駆逐してくれたのだ！
これならもう、鉄灯団を投入したり冒険者を雇わなくて済む。

source: TEXT_JOBAOZ580_03735_FYRGEISS_000_051<tab>As a matter of fact, I am considering deploying voidsent elsewhere to protect my interests from roaming beasts, Amalj'aa marauders, and the like, leaving my son and his men free to return to Ul'dah, where their talents could be put to better use.
target:
TEXT_JOBAOZ580_03735_FYRGEISS_000_051アマジナ鉱山協会の施設は、野生の魔物や、
アマルジャ族など、常に外敵の脅威にさらされているのだ。
ずっと鉄灯団に替わる戦力を欲していたのだよ。

source: TEXT_JOBAOZ580_03735_ROYSE_000_052<tab>So that's what this is all about. It was just a ploy to get your hands on my pit fiends, wasn't it? This is a breach of our agreement!
target:
TEXT_JOBAOZ580_03735_ROYSE_000_052あなたまさか、そのためにウチに出資を……？
だとしても、魔物を兵器にすることを許したつもりはないわ！
これは重大な契約違反よ！

source: TEXT_JOBAOZ580_03735_FYRGEISS_000_053<tab>Breach? With the vast amount I have invested into it, the Celestium is as good as mine.
target:
TEXT_JOBAOZ580_03735_FYRGEISS_000_053フン……なにが契約違反だ。
私はすでに、ブルースカイに莫大な融資をしている。
今や運営費の半分以上は、我が協会の出資によるもの……。

source: TEXT_JOBAOZ580_03735_FYRGEISS_000_054<tab>I have the right to run it in any way I please. Every last mammet, voidsent, and wild beast in that menagerie belongs to me now.
target:
TEXT_JOBAOZ580_03735_FYRGEISS_000_054つまり、経営権もまた半分以上は私のもの。
魔物の利用法を含む、運営に口を出す権利もあるわけだ。

source: TEXT_JOBAOZ580_03735_ROYSE_000_055<tab>I allowed you to invest in the Celestium, not to buy it from under my nose!
target:
TEXT_JOBAOZ580_03735_ROYSE_000_055た、確かにたくさんの出資をしてもらったけど、
あなたにブルースカイを売った覚えはないわッ！

source: TEXT_JOBAOZ580_03735_FYRGEISS_000_056<tab>If you think I am the sort to stand back and wait for the coin to come trickling in, you are <var 1A 02 /var>very<var 1A 01 /var> much mistaken!
target:
TEXT_JOBAOZ580_03735_FYRGEISS_000_056何を言う！？
最も金を出している者こそオーナーだろうッ！！

source: TEXT_JOBAOZ580_03735_ROYSE_000_057<tab>I didn't get where I am today by letting blustering fools with more gil than sense push me around. The Celestium is mine, you hear me!?
target:
TEXT_JOBAOZ580_03735_ROYSE_000_057ブルースカイのオーナーはこの私ッ！
誰がどう言おうが、この事実は揺るがないッ……！！

source: TEXT_JOBAOZ580_03735_FYRGEISS_000_058<tab>Watch your mouth, you second-rate hack!
target:
TEXT_JOBAOZ580_03735_FYRGEISS_000_058黙れッ……この三流経営者ッ！
この私こそが、真なるブルースカイのオーナーだッ！

source: TEXT_JOBAOZ580_03735_ROYSE_000_059<tab>Oh, is that so? Maybe I should ask your friends at the Syndicate who <var 1A 02 /var>they<var 1A 01 /var> think is second-rate?
target: TEXT_JOBAOZ580_03735_ROYSE_000_059<tab>何よッ……この……落ち目の砂蠍衆ッ！！

source: TEXT_JOBAOZ580_03735_FYRGEISS_000_060<tab>I'll drive you out of Ul'dah─nay, Eorzea! Everything you own will be mine! Mine!
target: TEXT_JOBAOZ580_03735_FYRGEISS_000_060<tab>貴様はクビだぁぁぁッ……！！

source: TEXT_JOBAOZ580_03735_MARTYN_000_061<tab>Might I make a suggestion? If you're looking for a substitute for the Stone Torches, perhaps the Blue Mages' Guild is a more...manageable alternative to rampaging beasts.
target:
TEXT_JOBAOZ580_03735_MARTYN_000_061あ、あのう……。
新たな戦力が欲しいのなら、青魔道士を検討してみては……？

source: TEXT_JOBAOZ580_03735_MARTYN_000_062<tab>Each of our mages comes fully equipped with a comprehensive selection of offensive, defensive, and healing spells, perfect for every occasion.
target:
TEXT_JOBAOZ580_03735_MARTYN_000_062我ら青魔道士は、盾役や攻撃役、癒し手といった、
ひとつの役割に当てはまらない、万能の戦闘職ですよ。

source: TEXT_JOBAOZ580_03735_FYRGEISS_000_063<tab>Every occasion? Come now, we all know that he who embraces too much has a weak grasp. I have no need of pathetic jesters in silly costumes.
target: TEXT_JOBAOZ580_03735_FYRGEISS_000_063<tab>フン……中途半端で、どれにもなれないだけだろう？

source: TEXT_JOBAOZ580_03735_MARTYN_000_064<tab>Oi, watch it, grandad! We'll see who's pathetic when I put your boy on his arse!
target:
TEXT_JOBAOZ580_03735_MARTYN_000_064それは、マスク・ザ・ブルーとジークフリードとの決戦で、
証明されることになるでしょう！

source: TEXT_JOBAOZ580_03735_MARTYN_000_065<tab>In fact, it seems to me that we could settle this whole dispute with a friendly wager.
target:
TEXT_JOBAOZ580_03735_MARTYN_000_065こうなったら、あなたとロイスさんの決着も、
試合で決めようじゃありませんか？

source: TEXT_JOBAOZ580_03735_MARTYN_000_066<tab>If I lose, the Celestium goes to you, includin' the whole menagerie. You can use all of those voidsent, along with the rest of the pit fiends, however you like.
target:
TEXT_JOBAOZ580_03735_MARTYN_000_066私が負ければ、ブルースカイのオーナーはあなた。
魔物の兵器利用も認めましょう。

source: TEXT_JOBAOZ580_03735_MARTYN_000_067<tab>But if I win, the Celestium stays with Royse. You'll give up any thought of usin' voidsent and employ the Blue Mages' Guild to defend your property instead.
target:
TEXT_JOBAOZ580_03735_MARTYN_000_067しかし、私が勝てば、ブルースカイのオーナーはロイスさん。
魔物は諦めてもらい、我ら青魔道士を戦力として、
業務を委託していただくということで……。

source: TEXT_JOBAOZ580_03735_ROYSE_000_068<tab>You bloody idiot! What do you think you're doing!?
target: TEXT_JOBAOZ580_03735_ROYSE_000_068<tab>ちょ、ちょっと、そんなこと勝手に……

source: TEXT_JOBAOZ580_03735_FYRGEISS_000_069<tab>You have spirit, I'll give you that. Very well, I accept.
target:
TEXT_JOBAOZ580_03735_FYRGEISS_000_069面白いじゃないか！
いいだろう、その賭けにのった……！

source: TEXT_JOBAOZ580_03735_ZIRNBERK_000_070<tab>I cannot decide which I am looking forward to most; adding the Celestium to my family's ever-growing collection of businesses, or utterly humiliating you in front of your beloved audience. I will see you in the arena, clown.
target:
TEXT_JOBAOZ580_03735_ZIRNBERK_000_070宣伝のためとはいえ、見世物となることにも飽きていましたが、
これは面白くなってきましたね……。
試合を楽しみにしていますよ。

source: TEXT_JOBAOZ580_03735_MARTYN_000_071<tab>Now that's settled, we might as well get goin'. Thanks to the voidsent, it looks like we won't be huntin' hecatoncheires after all.
target:
TEXT_JOBAOZ580_03735_MARTYN_000_071さて、カッパーベル銅山の巨人族が片付いたということは、
残念ながら実証研究は、お預けということだな。

source: TEXT_JOBAOZ580_03735_MARTYN_000_072<tab>Nutiba, P'yandih, I don't think I'll be able to give any more lessons until after my match, so perhaps you should go and learn some new spells or somethin'. <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var> and I will head back to the guild.
target:
TEXT_JOBAOZ580_03735_MARTYN_000_072弟子のふたりには、また青魔法を習得しにいってもらうとして、
ウルダハへと戻るとしよう。

source: TEXT_JOBAOZ580_03735_FYRGEISS_000_076<tab>That blue-garbed friend of yours certainly has a big mouth when it suits him. His little outburst will cost Royse dearly, you mark my words.
target:
TEXT_JOBAOZ580_03735_FYRGEISS_000_076ククク……。
悪いが、ブルースカイは私のものになるよ。

source: TEXT_JOBAOZ580_03735_ZIRNBERK_000_077<tab>You must be Azuro the Second, yes? I daresay you are a lot more capable than that cretin you insist on following around.
target:
TEXT_JOBAOZ580_03735_ZIRNBERK_000_077あなたが二代目マスク・ザ・ブルーですね？
フフフ……初代よりもずっと、お強そうだ。

source: TEXT_JOBAOZ580_03735_ROYSE_000_078<tab><sigh> I can't believe this...
target:
TEXT_JOBAOZ580_03735_ROYSE_000_078はぁ……。
大変なことになっちゃったわ……。

source: TEXT_JOBAOZ580_03735_LATOOLJA_000_079<tab>Latool Ja hear what happened. No wonder Royse look so distraught.
target:
TEXT_JOBAOZ580_03735_LATOOLJA_000_079お帰りな、さい。
ロイスさんが、珍しくため息、ついてま、す。

source: TEXT_JOBAOZ580_03735_MARTYN_000_080<tab>Ha! Nothin' like raisin' the stakes to make a fight more interestin', wouldn't you say?
target:
TEXT_JOBAOZ580_03735_MARTYN_000_080これで、ジークフリードとの試合が、
なおさら負けられぬ戦いとなったわけだな……。

source: TEXT_JOBAOZ580_03735_ROYSE_000_081<tab>As much as the very idea of it brings bile to the back of my mouth, the future of the Celestium is in your hands, Martyn. If you lose to Siegfried, I'll throw you to the behemoths!
target:
TEXT_JOBAOZ580_03735_ROYSE_000_081こうなったらマーティン、あなただけが頼りよ。
マスクカーニバルのために、絶対に勝ってちょうだい！

source: TEXT_JOBAOZ580_03735_MARTYN_000_082<tab>Fear not! I, the Great Azuro, swear to defend your arena with my very life!
target: TEXT_JOBAOZ580_03735_MARTYN_000_082<tab>大船に乗ったつもりでいてください！

source: TEXT_JOBAOZ580_03735_MARTYN_000_083<tab>Like I have a bloody choice... This is another fine mess I've talked myself into. Anyway, like I said before, I'll need you to be ready to stand in for me, on the off chance I eat some dodgy dragon peppers or somethin' and am “unavoidably detained,” if you catch my meanin'.
target:
TEXT_JOBAOZ580_03735_MARTYN_000_083さてと、次はいよいよジークフリードとの決戦だ。
補欠の君には観戦してもらうことになるだろうが、
試合まで何が起こるかわからない。

source: TEXT_JOBAOZ580_03735_MARTYN_000_084<tab>Oh, and there's one more spell I want you to learn. It's called Frog Legs, and while it might not be all that useful in the arena, you'll be able to put it to use once we're gettin' paid to protect Amajina & Sons' mines.
target:
TEXT_JOBAOZ580_03735_MARTYN_000_084)) (( )) 02 /var>君には、
青魔法「フロッグレッグ」をラーニングして、
青魔道士として限界まで高めたら、またここに来てほしい。

source: TEXT_JOBAOZ580_03735_MARTYN_000_085<tab>As Azuro the Second, I'm expectin' great things from you. Now go, make your guildmaster proud!
target:
TEXT_JOBAOZ580_03735_MARTYN_000_085二代目マスク・ザ・ブルーよ！
試合に向けて、お互い最高の状態を目指すのだ！
